name: Color Gems (itch) (M4DOOM)
description:
It's a simple Platformer Game about Collecting Gems to active the platformers 

Avoid the Ghosts... if they hit you... Fall Fall Falllllllll.

There are 2 Modes:
1- Simple: Playing among the ghost and try to collect all gems to win.
2- Endless: Always go with the camera to the Top and try to not go down.
